name: Speed Training
description: Develop agility and control for faster cutting shapes movement sequences.

cards.title: Tempo Drills
cards.description: Increase foot speed while maintaining balance and control.
bulletpoints: Start slow and gradually increase speed
Focus on landing softly to avoid impact stress
Keep core engaged for better stability

cards.title: High-Speed Foot Switches
cards.description: Rapidly alternate foot positions to create an illusion of floating movement.
bulletpoints: Keep feet close to the ground to minimize effort
Use ankle control to switch directions seamlessly
Stay in sync with the beat to maintain rhythm
